text: Explosion () is a 1973 Romanian drama movie directed by Mircea Drăgan and starring Radu Beligan, Gheorghe Dinica, Toma Caragiu, Dem Radulescu, George Motoi, Draga Olteanu Matei. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mircea Drăgan
title: Explosion (1973 movie)
